General.Name: Houston American Energy Corporation
General.Description: Houston American Energy Corp., an independent oil and gas company, engages in the acquisition, exploration, exploitation, development, and production of natural gas, crude oil, and condensate in the United States. The company's principal properties are located primarily in the Texas Permian Basin, the South American country of Colombia, and the onshore Louisiana Gulf Coast region. Houston American Energy Corp. is based in Houston, Texas.
General.Address: 801 Travis Street, Houston, TX, United States, 77002
